item.title: Suicide is About Wanting to Live
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Lyka Sebelina)
item.description:
-Written By Odawni

The Paradox of Suicidal Thinking

If you’ve never experienced suicidal thinking, the idea of wanting to end your life seems extreme. It is.

It’s extremely painful to wrestle with a brain screaming at you that you’re better off dead.

item.title: Thoughts
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Lyka Sebelina)
item.description:
• the uncertainty of everything

Has the uncertainty of the world ever crossed your mind? What will happen in the future? I often ponder what the future holds and I always believe in the saying “It is what it is.”…
